ict373_assignment2

Class PayingCustomer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ict373_assignment2.Customer
      • ict373_assignment2.PayingCustomer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssociateCustomer

    public class PayingCustomer
extends Customer
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class representing a paying customer, which instantiates and processes all paying customer objects, their monthly subscription costs, and linked associate customer(s).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • calculateCustomerPayment

        protected static java.lang.Double calculateCustomerPayment(java.lang.Double monthly,
                                                           java.lang.Integer suppAmount,
                                                           java.lang.Integer amountOfSubs,
                                                           java.lang.String name,
                                                           java.lang.Double combinedSupplements)
        Calculates paying customer's monthly subscription fee. Inclusion within paying customer's supplement amount and combined supplement pricing is that of their Linked associate customer(s) too.
        Parameters:
        monthly - A double containing the magazine's baseline monthly subscription price.
        suppAmount - An integer containing the amount of supplements the paying customer is paying for.
        amountOfSubs - An integer containing the amount of baseline magazine subscriptions for the paying customer.
        name - A string containing the paying customer's full name.
        combinedSupplements - A double containing the combined price of paying customers supplement subscriptions.
        Returns:
        the total, combined cost of each supplement and magazine subscription a paying customer is billed each month.

      • calculateSportsPayment

        protected static java.lang.Double calculateSportsPayment(java.lang.String name)
        Calculates the total cost of a paying customer, and their relative associate customer's, sport supplement subscriptions.
        Parameters:
        name - A string containing the name of the paying customer.
        Returns:
        a Double variable containing a combined total cost for paying customer's monthly sports supplement subscriptions.

      • getPaymentMethod

        public java.lang.String getPaymentMethod()
        Gets payment method of paying customer.
        Returns:
        A string representing the payment method used by the paying customer for themselves and their associate customer(s).
